She tastes... she tastes... phenomenal. More delicious than the juiciest, tenderest steak you've ever eaten. No wonder Renamon was the size freakin' sumo wrestler; the glutton just can't resist the taste of human flesh.
Now all that remains is your victim's feet. You suck them up like spagetti, throw your head back, and take one last, forceful swallow. Almost immediately, your stomach feels unbelievably full. Plus, you feel very, very content inside. It just felt so good to have someone inside of your belly, squirming and breathing. You walk over to Renamon, lifting your stomach up so you can walk easier. "Well...", you say, "That was an.... interesting breakfast. But... I feel... kind of tired".

Renamon smiled. "Well, that's what can be expected from eating so much. You always did have eyes bigger than your stomach". She yawned as well. "Come, let's leave here and find a spot outside to digest in peace".

You exit the bus with Renamon, walk over to a nice, shady tree, and plop down to sleep. You can't help noticing you forgot something, but it doesn't matter to you.

==============
What you don't see, after you pass out...
==============

A man in a completely black uniform walks over to you and Renamon. He feels both of your distended stomachs. "Good", he says. "Digestion has just begun for both Subjects". He pulls out some kind of syringe-like device with a test tube attached, sticks it into you and Renamon's bellies, extracts some of the soupy mixture of liquidated flesh and stomach acid, then removes the test tube filled with the liquid and smiles grimly as he holds it up to the sun. "The scientists down at the Organization will be pleased to have more human DNA to work with....."
1411112.title: Chapter 7: Black Renamon's Belly Bulge

choices: For the sake of Rika, Renamon, and you life, let them expirement
The hell with that!! We need to get out of here and make me human again!
14111121.content:
When you awake, you find yourself in complete darkness. Was that all a dream? It all felt so real.

If you remembered, your dream consisted of being the mate of a very bloated Renamon. The both you also found a bus and devoured every person inside, save for one person which you killed with a Bowie knife. Had to all be a dream... except... why was your bedroom so damn dark? And... why are you all furry? And, why do you feel like you've been chained up? Oh no, you realize. That wasn't a dream. But what was going on?

As lights flicker on overhead, you realize what has happened. You, still in Black Renamon form and tied up with the still-bloated Renamon, are being held onto an autopsy table. Staring over you are a bunch of men in black suits. The only one with something different was a man in a white suit, with balding grey hair.

The white-suited man sneers, "Ah, you two abominations woke up at last. Enjoy your nap?" You feel Renamon struggling next to you in her chains. It kind of looked funny to see her unconfortably wiggle her flab around as she struggled. "Where are we", she demanded with a strong voice. "That does not concern you", states the man. "As for myself, you may call me the Big Brother. As for you, Mr. Aaron Montel...."

The old bastard slapped you in the belly. It was still kind of full from your meal, and it felt like undigested bones slushed inside your bread basket. "...you may call yourself our first Subject", said the man.

"First Subject?!" What was he talking about?! "Yes", Big Brother laughed. "Allow me to explain..."

"When first these... 'digimon' emerged into our world,
we at this fine organization have been studying them. One of the things we were fascinated of were their strange eating habits. While most organisms did not require to eat other live organisms, freaks like your fake mate did. And when they ate a human..."

A few black-suited men left the table to go mess with other machinery in the room. After many whirs and strange electrical sounds, some more lights begun to glow in the room. It was then that both you and Renamon gasp.

To the left of the autopsy table happened to be 5 very science fiction-like containers. They were filled with a purplish liquid, and attached via tubes appeared to be people! Not just any people, either... while you looked on with perverted eyes at the naked women floating in the tubes, one's facial features look very familiar...

"What the... that's the woman I swallowed on the bus", you exclaim. The old man in white laughed. "Of course it is! Taking the DNA from the pre-digested bodies of those you have devoured, we are able to reproduce clones of people. And, taking their protiens, which you have turned data, we can store their memories and personalities onto a computer and program the clones so that they are exact copies of the fallen person!"

Holy fuck. This day just keeps getting wierder and wierder. Just what were these freaks trying to accomplish in making clones of dead people? By god, it was like some cheesy fetish fanfiction or something.

"What does this have to do with me?" asked Renamon. "Good question", said the man. "You are our first test subject. From you, we were able just to see how the digestive system of digimon in reality works. Also, from your DNA, were we able to transform a human into a digimon as well. Isn't that right, Mr. Montel?" You glare at the man's statement. "You've been in our control since you've arrived in this world, and Montel has been a digimon since 3 months. It was today that we've awakened him, and also programmed your mind into thinking he's your lover. Isn't funny what people can do to a digimon when their brains are just computer data?"

Renamon yelled in anger. "What makes you think I won't destroy everything and everyone in this organization?!"

"Because", said BB softly. "You are too damn fat to do much now. Besides... your tamer resides inside of you..." Huh?! By her looks, Renamon was just as confused as you were. "That Rika girl... she was your first victim. We had sent you to Japan after we had brainwashed you. And the result?"

A projector screen rolled down in front of the autopsy table. Playing on it appeared to be Rika's house from the anime... but the home and her were real. Renamon looked in horror as she, in her normal lean form, devoured Rika. Once the "movie" was over with, the old man turned to Renamon. "Of course, we were unable to obtain her DNA because you had completely digested her before returning to American shores. However, if we could obtain her data, we could prehaps rebuild her someday. Until then, you two will remain here until we require you again. We also expect an answer from the both of you as well".

The old man and his dark-clothed workers left the room in complete darkness. And judging from the shaking fat and rattling of chains next to you, Renamon was crying.

Now it's all up to you. What will be your fate?
14111121.title: Chapter 8: The Organization

choices: Suddenly, rescue comes!
Much later...
141111211.content:
==================
An evil place...
==================

You look over to Renamon as she sobs. "I... I don't even remember doing that... How could I have eaten her?" she mutters, tears streaming down her face.

You frown, thinking back on what you remember to be your life before meeting up with Renamon. As you do, you guess that if this had happened before now, you probably would have dismissed Renamon and left her to her fate, begging to be released.

But something has changed in you, and the more you think about it, it's a change for the better. (Even if you're a man-eating Digimon now.) This woman loves you unconditionally, and is apparently carrying your child. You can't abandon her now.

"Do what you want with me," you say, glaring a whole into Big Brother, who just smirks, "Just don't hurt her."

"Or your children, correct?" Big Brother says. When your eyes widen in surprise, Big Brother laughs. "Don't look so shocked. We did a full bio-scan on both of you when you were brought in. We know about your kits, Mr. Montel. They'll make FINE additions to our experiments once they're born!"

"DAMN YOU!!" you scream, suddenly horrified, "LEAVE THEM OUT OF THIS!!"

"LET US GO!! HAVEN'T YOU DONE ENOUGH!?" Renamon snarled, the threat to her unborn young bringing back a bit of her old warrior's fire. She strained against her bonds, the strong muscles underneath her flab causing the metal bonds on the table holding her to creak under the strain of holding her.

Big Brother laughed. "Don't bother. Those bonds can hold any Digimon short of Azulongmon and his brothers. And as for your deal, forget it. You're both staying here until we need you out in the field again. But don't worry, it's all for a good cause."

You scowl. You reflexively try summoning a Diamond Storm, but something is blocking the ability, leaving only the slight rush of feeling from summoning the energy. "What cause would that be?"

"You'll find out," Big Brother says, laughing as he walks off, leaving the both of you in the darkness...
141111211.title: Chapter 9: Deal With A Devil

choices: The next day...
1411112111.content:
Just as Big Brother left the room, he came flying back in.

"ENDLICH METEOR!!!"

A golden-black fireball slammed into his chest, sending him flying back behind you and Renamon. You both look in the direction of the fireball, trying to see who was there. There's a sound of fighting in the darkness, and a few guards stagger out and collapse. Their attacker emerges.

"Löwemon?!" you say, recognizing the black-armored, humanoid Digimon as he entered the room, twirling his lance. He takes one glances at the two of you and slashes your bonds, shredding them.

You can't help but grin. "Thank you. But why are you doing this?"

"No time to talk," he thunders in a deep, rich voice, "I've unleashed my darker aspect and he's going to destroy this place. He's already started to create the Zone Deleter circle, so we have to leave NOW."

He gestures, creating a portal of darkness in the middle of the room as you help Renamon up.

She scowls back at Big Brother, who lays unconcious in a corner, his chest smoldering.

"Let me finish him," she snarls suddenly.

"No time," Löwemon insists, gripping her by a chubby shoulder, "Trust me, he'll get his and then some. GO!"

Reluctantly, she steps through the portal. You stare at Löwemon for a moment before running after her.

====================
A ridge far away...
====================

You both emerge on a hilltop about a mile away from the complex where you were taken. You yourself spot a reddish-black, birdlike creature you recognize as Velgmon gliding along the ground, tearing a large circle around the entire complex with his wing.

Löwemon emerges shortly after you do, just as Velgmon finishes off the circle.

"ZONE DELETER!" the demonic bird screams. The circle turns into a dome of black energy, engulphing the entire complex and everyone in it. There was a brief images of a great, grinning face on the dome before it dissolved, leaving nothing left but a crater.

Löwemon sighs in relief. "That's over with," he says.

An image appears in the reflective surface of his metal lance, an image of a pair of lips. "Did you get all the experiments out?"

Löwemon nods. "I did, Mercuremon. These were the last two. And ironically, according to our records, among their first experiments."

"Why did they do this to us?" you ask, unable to help youself any longer.

Löwemon turns towards you, hesitation evident in his eyes. Velgmon flew up to him and landed near him, morphing back into Duskmon.

Mercuremon sighed and said, "Better tell him. It won't matter anyway once it's over. I'll check in with Wolfmon and Fairymon, tell them your status."

Löwemon nodded again, sighing. Duskmon hugged him gently, and merged with his body, becoming a cloud of darkness before Löwemon absorbed him.

"Alright, here's the scoop. We ten warriors, myself, Mercuremon, Grottomon, Ranamon, Arbormon, Agnimon, Blitzmon, Wolfmon, Fairymon, and Chakkumon, were the first Digimon to enter this world. We met up with some human soldiers and scientists, the latter accidentally giving me the ability to create Duskmon, and made a deal. We'd start bringing Digimon over to this world, and in exchange for leaving them unmolested, they could study their eating habits and mating habits. Eventually, we started converting humans into Digimon if we felt they met criteria to be good mates for those we decided to focus on. Like you, ma'am."

Renamon snarled. She may have given herself over to a life of gluttony, but she still possessed her quick wits and intelligence. "These monsters worked for you."

You stare at your rescuer in shock as an ashamed look comes over his face. "It was never supposed to happen this way," he says, "You and all the others that started to eat humans were supposed to remain free. This agency was run by rogues and madmen who were making their own schemes. We were only able to find this base recently. And as for Rika... I'm horribly sorry. That was not supposed to happen."

Renamon snarled, and started to summon a Diamond Storm. But you were thinking quickly, and stopped her. As fat as she was, she'd be no match for the powerful Löwemon. "And what about me?" you say, glaring at him.

"Rika was our first choice for Renamon. When they re-wired her into a glutton, we had to find someone new, who'd like her as a voraphilic glutton. After psychic scanning many people, we found you, who had the subconcious liking of both larger women, Digimon, and the concept of swallowing people whole, despite your fear. We chose you and remade you into a Digimon. Unfortunetly, they got to you too. Thankfully, the damage they did to you was minimal."

"You're letting them do their sick experiments? Like we were all lab animals?" Renamon said, snarling.

Löwemon shook his head. "I'm sorry. The best thing I can do for you is erase your memories of this day."

Before either of you can react, Löwemon holds out his hands. A small portion of Digital Code emerges from your heads and is absorbed into him. You both fall unconcious, and drop to the ground, Renamon's weight causing a small ground tremor. Löwemon sighs, and activates a communicator. "General Barkley. The experiments were rescued and the incident successfully purged from their minds."

Löwemon waited for a moment, listening to the response. "Thank you sir. As for what I'm going to do with them, I'll just add a memory. After they ate the people on that bus, they went to a bar and got incredibly drunk. They'll wake up in their apartment. They'll want to start over to make up for lost time on Aaron's birthday, so the study of Renamon eating and mating habits can continue."

Löwemon listened to the response and chuckled. "I know that she's much more gluttonous that the other Renamons you're studying. Well, be fair, General. You humans taste DELICIOUS. Löwemon out," he said, creating a cloud of darkness aand teleporting both himself, you, and Renamon away.

145.content:
"I... I'm a SKUNK?!!" you shriek, staring at your long, exceedingly fluffy tail with the prominent double-stripe of white. You run your hands over your muzzle, opening your mouth and feeling your teeth, not in their normal, human arrangement. You frantically search through the nearby drawer until you find a handmirror. You look into it, and see your furry, skunklike face for the first time, your head topped by a crest of white hair to match the stripe going down your back.

"Oh God..."

Renamon frowned. "Something's wrong. Aaron, I really think we should get you to a doctor."

"WRONG!?" you say, panicking, "What could be wrong!? I go to bed human and alone, only to wake up to find that I'm the skunkman lover of a fat, pregnant Renamon!! What could POSSIBLY be wrong?!"

Renamon gasped. "Aaron... You've NEVER been human... And we've been lovers for years..."

"NO!!" you shout, shaking your head vigorously, "I'm human! HUMAN!! I have to be!!" Your hands grip your hair as you scream in frustration, trying to figure out what's going on, your tail flicking back and forth.

Renamon took your hand in her chubby paw. "We're going to the doctor. Right now."
145.title: Skunky Surprise

choices: "Just relax.  Bring him in and I'll take care of it."
"I have a pill for him that will finish his programming.  Just be careful.
1451.content:
After a moment, you nod. You put on a pair of shorts and a t-shirt, as well as a pair of sandals (your clothes are the same at least, save for a few modifications for your tail), and let her lead you out, her chubby arm wrapping around yours. You take the elevator down, Renamon humming to herself. But when the elevator stops, you freeze for a moment, wondering if everyone else is changed as you are.

The door slides open, and you gape. Everyone is still HUMAN! You freeze for a moment, waiting for everyone's reaction.

But other than someone waving hello, there's NO reaction. Another man asks how you are, and Renamon says,

"Well, we were fine last night, but now something's wrong. He can't remember anything and thinks he used to be human!"

The one she was talking to, a chubby man wearing a tuxedo, frowned. He turned to you and said, "Sir, let me assure you that I've known you for years. You two are my best tenants, and in the time I've known you, you have NEVER been human."

It's then you recognize him as Arther von Tarne, one of the richest men in the world, and a real estate GOD. Are you living in one of his apartments?

Renamon frowns at seeing your shocked look, and leads you on, hailing a cab. "Don't worry honey. Everything will be all right," she says. You nod numbly as you get into the cab, Renamon hefting her tremendous bulk in next to yours, the car shifting heavily to the side under her weight.

"Sorry," she says to the cabby, a young man of Arabian decent. You don't really notice, you're too busy staring at the sign on the awning of the apartment, staring at the name Tarne Plaza.

You're living at one of the most expensive, beautiful apartment buildings in the world.

Yet another weirdness in your life.

"No problem," he says, grinning, "Where to?"

"Morgan General Hospital, please," she says, pulling out a large wad of bills from her pocket, "And step on it."

The cabbie blinked at the roll of money and grinned, pulling out into traffic and zooming off. Quicker than what you would have thought possible, you arrive at a big white hospital building. Renamon gets out first, the car bouncing roughly, banging your head off of the ceiling.

Renamon winces. "Sorry honey."

You shake your head. "I've had worse," you say, smiling weakly. Which you have. Aside from that, having this lovely, if quite literally VERY soft and cuddly woman dote on you is making you feel good despite your confusion.

The two of you head into the reception area, the fact that no one seems surprised by the fact that a pair of animal people are in the lobby just making your confusion even worse.

You sit down and wait in the lobby, staring at your tail, as Renamon goes in to talk to the doctor...

================
Doctor's Office...
================

"You were right to come see me, miss Montel," the doctor, a buff, but greying around the edges man with grey hair and glasses. "He woke up before his programming was completed, but you played your part beautifully."

"I hope you can help finish his programming, Doctor Winx. I know that we were both remade from who we used to be and brainwashed to serve whatever clandestine evil thing you have in mind, but I kinda like him. Aside from that, he IS the father of my kits, even if just from artifical insemination." Renamon said, wriging her hands.

"And you were hoping that he could father the next batch the natural way?" the doctor said, grinning, silently proud of himself from reprogramming this woman so totally that he could tell her anything he wanted to about his organization's scheme and it wouldn't bother her at all.

Renamon blushed. "Yeah, kinda. I mean, from what I read in his profile when you captured him, he seems like a nice guy. And since the modifications your people made on my body are in line with his own personal tastes, he's bound to like me."

She sighed. "At least, I hope so."

The doctor chuckled softly, and said...
1451.title: Off To The Doc

choices: Meanwhile, in the waiting room...
A few minutes later, the doctor leads you out, completely 'cured...'
14511.content:
"Just relax. Bring him in and I'll take care of it," the doctor said. Renamon nodded and went back out into the waiting room. The doctor began moving chairs aside in preparation.

A nurse came in, a lavender-haired woman wearing sunglasses. "Sir, I have a question. Is she a real Renamon or just someone we made into one?"

The doctor just smirked.

A moment later, Renamon, hugging your arm tightly. You give the doctor a worried look, but he just smiles and motions for you to sit down.

You sit down, instinctively curling your tail so you don't sit on it.

The doctor turns to Renamon and smiles. "If you'll wait out in the waiting area, this will all be over shortly."

Renamon nods, and kisses you on the cheek, causing you to wince slightly. The doctor nods to the nurse, who closes the door she came in and locks, locking the other door as well.

"Umm..." you state, suddenly frightened, "What's going on?"

The doctor grins, and you notice that his lips are suddenly bright red, almost like he's wearing lipstick. His voice, once low and soft, becomes very feminine and lilting.

"Why, we're here to help you my boy! Isn't that right, Fairymon?"

You turn to the nurse, who has changed form, sprouting large, butterfly-like wings. Her body is now clad in a revealing lavender suit and her hair has turned dark blue, her eyes covered by a visor. She grins wickedly at you and points back to the doctor.

You gasp, wanting to scream but not able to find the breath to do so.

The doctor has become inhuman, a massive, hulking being of green metal and mirrors, his face now a reflective mirror with lips painted on. He flexed his black metal claws, summoning two, massive, shield-like mirrors to his forearms.

"M-M-Mercuremon..." you stammer.

Mercuremon chuckles. "That's right! Now hold still, Breeder Zero, this is going to sting a little..."

He holds up his mirror-shields, a light radiating from deep within them, one that grows blindingly bright...
14511.title: Shock Treatment

choices: The two go out to eat...
The two head to the park...
145112.content:
====================
The waiting room...
====================

Renamon fidgeted in the uncomfortable chairs of the waiting room. Her ass was so huge, that she had to use two chairs to sit in. It had been almost ten minutes since you had gone in, and she was getting very nervous. She flipped through the out-of-date magazines quickly, unable to focus.

I hope you're okay, she thought, adjusting herself yet again to try and get comfortable, her fat belly jiggling with her motions.

After a few more minutes of waiting, she grumbled and stood up. "I can't take this anymore," she said, waddling over to a pudgy young man who was napping on another chair.

Maybe if I eat something, it'll calm me down, she thought, grabbing the man and lifting her off of the chair, hugging him to her soft, round belly.

He blinked, startled, still half-asleep and unable to react before his vision was filled entirely by Renamon's salivating maw.

With a muffled pop, her jaws expanded as she stuffed the man's head inside of them. Churring softly, she began to swallow over and over, the man disappearing steadily into the ravenous foxgirl's jaws, drool starting to coat his clothes as she devoured him.

Too late, as he slid into Renamon up to the waist, did the man start to struggle, his legs starting to flail. Renamon grumbled and held them down, not stopping her steady swallowing. Other people in the waiting room pointedly ignored her, not wanting to attract the flabby glutton's attention.

She took a few more swallows before pulling the man's shoes off and raising her head up. She quickly sucked in his calves, taking one last swallow to force him down into her belly.

Her gut expanded greatly to accept it's new occupant, becoming even wider. Impressions of the man's struggles could be vaguely seen in her flab. Renamon, satisfied, belched and patted her stomach, licking her lips happily. Eating always calmed her down.

"Mmm, that's just the way I like to see you. Eating and adding more to that sexy belly of yours," you say as you come out, smiling warmly at her.

Renamon turns, and grins widely as she sees you leaning up against the door, a loving grin on your face as the doctor stands nearby, smiling. She waddles over and hugs you tightly, and you let her.

Why not? She's your girlfriend, right? And you love her dearly, not just because she's an absolute hotty and bearing your children, but because she makes you happy in every possible way.

"Are you feeling better now?" she says, staring intently at you.

"Better than ever. I'm not sure what the doc did, but I remember everything now. No more delusions," you say, causing her to let out a happy cry and hug you tightly. You churr, your member growing hard at the feel of her soft, furry flab pressing up against you and hug her back, playfully grabbing her ample rump.

"Thank you doctor," Renamon said.

The doctor nodded, giving her a knowing wink. "No problem, it was my pleasure. Just come in for a checkup next week. I won't be here, but my associate, Dr. Agni will, and he's a better OBGYN than I am."

"I'll make sure to get her there, doc," you say, smiling, and the doctor nods, heading over to ask another patient to come with him.

The two of you kiss passionately for a moment, and then start to walk out of the hospital. You can't help but glance back, admiring the bounce of your girl's massive butt with each waddling step she takes.

"So what now? It's my birthday after all, and I wanna have some fun," you say.

"I'll do whatever you want, Aaron. This is your day," Renamon says, hugging your arm and smiling warmly.

"Oooh, what possibilities," you say, grinning playfull and thinking for a moment, "Hmmm... Well, we could always go out to eat. I love watching you cram food and prey into your mouth, knowing that it's going to make you even fatter and sexier..."

Renamon grined, obviously pleased with that idea. You smirk, and say, "Of course, we could always head to the park for a romantic stroll and romantic encounter." You emphasize your point by rubbing your crotch up against her side, letting her get a feel of your erect maleness, causing her to blush.

"Whatever you want, love," Renamon says, "I like both of those ideas."

You think for a moment, walking out of the hospital together, and decide...
145112.title: Back To 'Normal'

choices: She wants you to cook something...
She wants something live and squirmy...
She wants to go out to eat...
She wants you to bring something home for breakfast...
Renamon has something other than food in mind...
15.content:
Your reaction is somewhat understandable. You panic at this sudden change, and then blindly flee, wondering what in the world was going on.

When you calm down enough to have regained your senses, you look around. You are in a quiet park with only a few people around, you notice that they are all staring at you. Looking down you realize in your blind panic you forgot to reclothe yourself. Luckily you wore some boxers to bed, so at least one thing is like before, now you just need to figure out what happened.

A character you admire from a show is real, and now that you've calmed down enough to think, you realize that she's become sexier then you could ever imagine.

You're at a complete loss at what to think.

You randomly walk around town, adorned in your boxers, which fortunetly look enough like shorts so that you don't get too many strange looks.

Everything you see SEEMS normal; the clouds, the trees, and the buildings. Then you stop dead in your tracks looking into the donut store. The Renamon from this morning is there! You hear part of the conversation as you stop and listen, "...Have you seen my boyfriend, this morning when he woke up he just ran out the door. I assumed he might be here, he always picks me up a few dozen donuts in the morning."

You muster up your courage and walk up to her saying as calmly as you can muster, "Hello, could you explain exactly what is going on here?"

Renamon smiled warmly. "What do you mean honey?"

You shake your head. "THAT is what I mean, you calling me honey and all, you even existing for that matter."

Renamon giggled. "Sweetie, we've been together for arond eight months now."

You are baffled, somehow while you were asleep you hooked up with the girl of your dreams and lived happily with her for eight months!

You and Renamon walk back to your apartment. The last thing you remember is that you were in a dorm, but now apparently you live in an apartment building. Renamon sits down with a huff saying, "Honey, I'm starved. Will you please fetch me a little snack?"

You shake your head. "First I need some answers."

Renamon looked thoughtful for a moment, and said, "I guess these are the after effects that the doctor was talking about."

You blink in confusion, and say, "What doctor, what after effects?"

Renamon grinned, and said, "Honey, awhile ago when the real digital rift opened and I came to this world you were the one who took me in. Others ridiculed me for not being human, but you were kind to me, and introduced me to the most wonderful thing ever, this world's food. When you were grilling something for me when we were out on a picnic you were hit by a bolt of lightning. I am so lucky that you lived. It caused you to loose your memory. Although it did have some other effects."

You try to come to terms with this: amnesia, an awsome girlfriend, freak lightning storm.

This all sounded like a cheesy soap opera, or at least a silly fanfiction of some kind. Then another thought occurs to you.

What did she mean, other 'effects'? Did the lightning make you into some sort of D&D-esque lightning elemental?

As you are deep in thought trying to figure everything out Renamon's belly gives a loud growl. Almost instinctually you stand to go to the kitchen to get food. There's a bright flash that doesn't seem to blind you, and you then seem to almost magically zap there!

You hear Renamon's giggles from the next room, and looking down see your charred boxers. You roll your eyes, irritated, and go to change clothes. After getting into some more comfortable clothing you decide that it is time for Renamon's breakfast. If nothing else, it'll help distract you from all the weirdness...

What will it be?

((Edited on 8/8/2005 by FFtheSnake))

151.content:
You walk back in the kitchen open the fridge and food falls out on you and lots of it too. From under the pile of food you yell "So what will it be?" A moment of silence hangs in the air. Then "I'll have ten slices of bacon, five eggs, a plates worth of hash browns and a gallon of juice please." You gape at what she just said "I was just gonna have coffe and an egg. Oh well Renamon gets what a Renamon wants I suppose" You say to yourself then a witty reply comes from the lveing room "I do get what I want." then you both laugh. You get out from under the food and about an hour or so later you come out with the food on a TV tray then ou walk back in and come out with a cup of coffe and some extra bacon. She sniffs the food "HONEY THIS SMELLS AMAZING!" You sniff the bacon "Smells normal to me." You reply but she wasnt paying attention.

________
Two hours later

you had finished breakfast a long time ago and so had she but she fell asleep so you had been sitting there thinking how this had happened. Just then you look at your hand and jump somehow landing on Renamon. She was still asleep you look at your hand again it was covered in fur a pure white fur. How didnt you notice this earlier you walk over to a mirror you are now what some call a furry with red eyes and you look very skinny. Your still cheecking yourself out when you hear a...
151.title: Home cooking or a resteraunt?

choices: continuation 1
continuation 2
152.content:
You walk to the kitchen, what in the world does a Renamon eat? You are deep in thought reviewing episodes in your mind, did they ever say Renamon's favorite food? After a bit of thought you decide to just ask. You walk over to Renamon and shyly ask, "Honey, what do you normally eat? You know I have the whole amnesia thing and all."

Renamon muses to herself, "Hmmm, what do I feel like eating today? I guess I'll have a fem."

You inquire, "'Fem?' what do you mean 'fem.' I don't know what you are talking about."

Renamon says, "Fem means girl, you should know that." She grins at you, then winces as another growl comes from her belly. You leave the house, and start walking down the street. A few moments later you realize, how in the heck are you supposed to just grab a girl for her to eat... Wait, she eats people?. Your brain kicks back in and starts processing. None of this can be real, it has to be a dream. Freak lightning storms don't just happen, for that matter neither do rifts to the digital world. Your mind goes a mile a minute with a billion different conspiracy theories. Then you realize, so what? So what if it is some big conspiracy, it makes you happy, and there isn't anything you can do about it either.

You weren't paying attention as you were entrenched in thought. Your legs carried you to a strip joint. You never went to places like this but then an idea comes to you, just hire one of the girls for some, "extra money" and bring her home for your beautiful lover. You go into the club and see one of them just getting off her shift, she is beautiful by "normal" standards. She is very thin and busty with blue eyes and blond hair. She is wearing a semi-transparent, white shirt with a nametag on it. Apparently she goes by "sparkles." You walk up to her and say in the smoothest voice you can manage, "Hey babe, you want to hook up for tonight?"

Sparkles replies, "Yeah that'll be $800."

You frantically feel around yourself trying to see if you have a wallet, you find that one thing is the same now as it was before, You're still broke. Sparkles looks up and sees you. After a few gazes she says, "Nevermind for someone who is as hot as you, it's free of charge." You sigh happily, you don't have to waist money getting a hooker to come to your house.

You bring her home and say to Renamon, "Breakfast is here." You close the door and lock it as Sparkles turns wild eyed to you. Your face that she found so beautiful is the last thing she sees. Renamon despite her size is still quite swift, and leaps at Sparkles. She quickly engulfs the blond locks of the girl. Renamon greedily swallows the girls shoulders and, using her immense strength hoists Sparkles into the air. Renamon then uses gravity to pull the large C breasts into her mouth. After that it is an easy gulp as Renamon finishes off the prostitute.

Once you realize what is going on after that sublime moment; you find that you are "pitching a tent, you embaresdly look at Renamon. She giggles and says, "Honey if you are so 'happy,' why not just do me now?" You are eager to take her up on her offer: But you really just met her this morning, in your mind at least. You say, "I'm sorry, I am not ready for that yet. I know we've been together for awhile, I just need to get to know you again." She looks as if she is about to respond when her belly lets loose a gurgling noise...

Choices 1 and 2 are both the choice of the next poster :)
152.title: Someone tasty...

1521.content:
You say, "What was that?"

*UUUUUUUURRRRPPP* Renamon belches loudly, her breath smells like Sparkles' perfume. She smiles to herself at the volume of her burp; then gazes at you lovingly, and tenderly tells you, "Just a sign I'm still hungry dear. You know I wouldn't get full on someone that skinny."

You respond, "What could be larger then a whole person that still meets your taste for a fem?"

She hugs you giggling, "Another pred of course. We'll have to go out of town for that though." "'Pred?'" "Another predator you silly boy. They are much bigger then these flat creatures that are miss-named as female around here." "Where do we go to find other preds?" "Anywhere outside the cities. It's mainly other digimon but some of the female humans have been taught the art. I guess I forgot to tell you, the ares outside the cities are lawless now, after the rift opened some other people from the digital world came here. Let's just say that not all of them are as nice as I am."

Outside the cities are lawless now? Life really is like a bad soap opera, or in this situation a western. You two walk out of the house, again you are amazed at Renamon's ability to move even with her over sized stomach. You realize that you two are moving and yet you are not walking. You realize one of your other "lightning" abilities is flight, this is excellent! When flying your form just changes into an electric blue jagged outline of your normal self. Then you think back, hopefully your clothes won't burn off this time. You check if you have any keys on you and find some in your shirt pocket. Unfortunately when you see your car it is not the peek of fashion. You have an old beat-up civic, even though your romantic dreams came true since you last remembered your economic state has not improved as much as you hoped.

You two drive out of the city, the only thing on the way that strikes you as strange is that once you are at the edge of the city there is a gigantic steel gate. Upon arriving at it you need to show 2 forms of ID and so does Renamon. You notice that she has a separate form of ID then you do, segregation between humans and Digimon must have started when they first came here.

The scenery is so much different now. There are normally smaller cities around a big one, but it seems as if everything except for the big cities was wiped out, now there is wilderness everywhere. All you see are tiny tents and such along the way and occasionally something moving around off in the distance.

Eventually you get out the gate, Renamon's stomach is really complaining now. She says, "I can't wait any longer, I have to eat now!" You both rush out of the car to find the nearest delicious thing for her.

You find

1 A Digimon that might sate her hunger

2 Something else...
1521.title: Seconds please

info.brief_description: You wake up one day to find yourself the lover of a gluttonous, fat Renamon...
info.description:
You went to sleep as usual, content and happy. But when you woke up, something had changed. You found yourself in bed with Renamon, only she was incredibly fat and, as you found out, pregnant with your children.

Later on, you find out that she is madly in love with you, is an incredible glutton, and can quite literally swallow anything whole and digest it completely, as she demonstrates when she swallows a bus full of people. And the strange thing is, people think that the two of you have always been together...

Play out the adventures of the main character as he tries to figure out what's going on. Pretty much nearly anything goes. I'll moderate on an as needed basis.
